author: Sarah Breathnach
message: Our deepest wishes are whispers of our authentic selves. We must learn to respect them. We must learn to listen.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henry Thoreau
message: The world is but a canvas to the imagination.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lisa Alther
message: Thats the risk you take if you change: that people you've been involved with won't like the new you. But other people who do will come along.
title: Thought of the day

author: Walter Benjamin
message: To be happy is to be able to become aware of oneself without fright.
title: Thought of the day
